translation: Having taken refuge in Me and doing all actions, by My grace he obtains the eternal, indestructible state of being.
commentary: 18.56 All actions all actions? Even also? Always always? doing doing? taking refuge in Me? By My grace by My grace? avapnoti obtains? Shasvatam the eternal? Padam state or abode? inexhaustible indestructible.Commentary Worshiping Me with the flowers of his good deeds he reaches the imperishable Brahmic seat of ineffable splendor through My grace.
